raw: UK coronavirus live: Boris Johnson to give more detail on lockdown changes .

raw: 2.50am EDT 02:50 Boris Johnson famously dislikes disappointing the people around him , writes the Guardian ’s deputy political editor Rowena Mason in this analysis .

raw: The result is this weekend ’s barrage of confused messaging over whether the lockdown is ending , as he tries to please both sides in the battle raging within the Tory party about how to respond to the coronavirus crisis .
replaced: The result is this weekend ’s barrage of confused messaging over whether the lockdown is ending , as Johnson tries to please both sides in the battle raging within the Tory party about how to respond to the coronavirus crisis .

raw: On the one hand , the rightwing hawks in his cabinet have been pushing him towards a swift return to business as usual to save the economy , setting out a roadmap to lifting the lockdown sooner rather than later .
replaced: On the one hand , the rightwing hawks in Johnson cabinet have been pushing Johnson towards a swift return to business as usual to save the economy , setting out a roadmap to lifting the lockdown sooner rather than later .

raw: On the other , the more centrist doves , including the health secretary , Matt Hancock , have been pulling him in another direction , urging caution for fear of a second peak and more lost lives .
replaced: On the other , the more centrist doves , including the health secretary , Matt Hancock , have been pulling Johnson in another direction , urging caution for fear of a second peak and more lost lives .

raw: The received wisdom is that Johnson is now on the side of the doves following his brush with death during a four - day spell in intensive care suffering from Covid-19 .
replaced: The received wisdom is that Johnson is now on the side of the doves following Johnson brush with death during a four - day spell in intensive care suffering from Covid-19 .
